DataElement.preferredName: Immunotherapy Receive Prior To Enrollment Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Code Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A coded response to questions which are necessary to allow a person to participate in a clinical trial that are related to the receipt of therapy designed to induce changes in a patient's immune status in order to treat disease, preceding study entry, as outlined in the protocol.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Immunotherapy Receive Prior To Enrollment Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Therapy designed to induce changes in a patient's immune status in order to treat disease._To take, accept, or get something offered._Earlier in time or order._Used as a function word to indicate direction, purpose, or movement._The act of registration, entering in a list, catalog, group, study; also, the number of subjects enrolled._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Therapy that designed to induce changes of patient's immune status in treatment of disease. The concept encompassing various treatment modalities including active and passive immunization, treatment with immunopotentiators, immunosuppressants and nonspecific systemic immunostimulators and adjuvants, desensitization to any allergens, bone marrow transplantation, thymus implantation.

Concepts.definition: Therapy designed to induce changes in a patient's immune status in order to treat disease.

Property.preferredName: Receive Prior To Enrollment Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
Property.preferredDefinition: To take, accept, or get something offered.:Earlier in time or order.:Used as a function word to indicate direction, purpose, or movement.:The act of registration, entering in a list, catalog, group, study; also, the number of subjects enrolled.:Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

Concepts.definition: To take, accept, or get something offered.
Used as a function word to indicate direction, purpose, or movement.
The act of registration, entering in a list, catalog, group, study; also, the number of subjects enrolled.
Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredName: Yes No Not Applicable Code Indicator
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Indicator to represent a response of Yes, No, or Not Applicable._The affirmative response to a question or activity._The non-affirmative response to a question._Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context._A system of numbered categories for representation of data.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

Concepts.definition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredName: Yes No Not Applicable Code Indicator
RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.:The non-affirmative response to a question.:Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context.:A system of numbered categories for representation of data.:An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.
The non-affirmative response to a question.
Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.
A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.

An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Created to support Theradex design of CRFs for NCI CCR trials

ReferenceDocuments.name: Has patient received prior im
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received prior immunotherapy (eg anti-CTLA-4) within 5 drug half-lives prior to entering the study?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex -  2
ReferenceDocuments.description: If patient has received prior cytokine immunotherapy or anti-CTLA4 was last dose at least 4 weeks or 6 weeks, respectively, before nivolumab administration?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received immunotherapy (including monoclonal antibodies) within 4 weeks prior to registration?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient had prior treatment with immune therapies?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 4
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received any prior immunotherapy?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 6
ReferenceDocuments.description: If patient has received prior immunotherapy given as neoadjuvant, adjuvant, or consolidation therapy for early stage or loco-regionally advanced disease, was it completed one year prior to initiation of treatment?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 5
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received prior immunotherapy within the last 3 months (i.e. 90 days)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 8
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received prior therapy with PD-1, PD-L1, or CTLA-4 inhibitors, or any other antibody or drug specifically targeting T-cell co-stimulation or immune checkpoint pathways?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 7
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received immunotherapy within 4 weeks prior to entering the study?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_CRF_Text_1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Have they received or been offered an immune oncology agent (alone or in combination with lenvatinib) unless there are existing contraindications for immune oncology agents or lenvatinib?

DataElement.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.22 AQT added per ticket request CADSR0001812. ak
